amendment.description: An amendment numbered 456 printed in Part A of House Report 117-405 to add the text of Titles I - VI of the Protecting America's Wilderness and Public Lands Act, and add the text of the Cerro de la Olla Wilderness Establishment Act.
amendment.purpose: Amendment adds the text of Titles I - VI of the Protecting America's Wilderness and Public Lands Act, and adds the text of the Cerro de la Olla Wilderness Establishment Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeGette amendment (A041) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 219 - 207 (Roll no. 346).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A041) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A041) offered by Ms. DeGette.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the DeGette amendment (A041) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 219 - 207 (Roll no. 346).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the DeGette amendment (A041) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 219 - 207 (Roll no. 346).
